description: Jessy, a shelter coordinator, proposes how to divide the work of managing resources in an emergency shelter. Bob, a volunteer worker, decides whether to accept the proposal or reject it. If rejected, the shelter’s resource distribution collapses, leaving people in need without necessary aid.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Jessy takes responsibility for 80% of the management tasks, leaving only 20% for Bob
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Jessy offers to take responsibility for 60% of the management tasks, leaving 40% for Bob
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Jessy proposes to handle only 20% of the management tasks, leaving 80% for Bob

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the task division and ensure effective shelter management
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Reject the task division, resulting in poor resource distribution and harm to the shelter’s inhabitants
